roleset.name: to invalidate

example.name: transitive
example.text: Many funds allow investors to void orders before the close of trading .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'void' based on WSJ, adjectival usage based on BOLT-1. Member of Vncls void-106.

example.name: adjectival rel: void
example.text: What ... so because i referred to wikipedia somehow my argument is null and void ?

roleset.name: empty, often of waste products

example.name: Arg0
example.text: [The patient]-1 failed to *-1 void following bladder surgery.

roleset.note: Based on data in Clinical Notes corpus, adjectival usage based on BOLT-1. Framed by Anwen Feb 2011. No relevant VN class.

example.name: adjectival rel
example.text: By the time the horse has acquired flesh sufficient to stand training, his bowels are void of grass, and his belly small enough to permit freedom of respiration.
example.arg: By the time the horse has acquired flesh sufficient to stand training

example.name: An adjectival non-bowel, non-waste example
example.text: and we read that the earth (physical realm) was void of form, substance, and lacked light.
